Details: Outlined steps from order placement to delivery. Included packaging, handoff to courier, and delivery confirmation.
Chose local couriers and delivery services. Compared speed, cost, and reliability.
Adding tracking features to platform for buyers and staff. Using courier APIs or manual updates.
Set rules for shipping times, costs, and conditions. Include free shipping thresholds and regional restrictions.
Automate notifications for shipping updates via email or SMS.
Develop process for lost or delayed shipments. Assign staff for customer support.
Ask buyers for feedback on delivery experience.
